tool_description: The International days are occasions to educate the general public on issues of concern, to mobilize political will and resources to address global problems, and to celebrate and reinforce achievements of humanity.
name: International Days
title: International Days

api_list.name: today
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://international-days.p.rapidapi.com/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-days.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://international-days.p.rapidapi.com/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-days.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
